Song.title: Great I Am
Song.copyright: Jared Anderson Â© 2011 Integrity Worship Music (Admin. by EMI Christian Music Publishing)

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: I wanna be close close to Your side So Heaven is real and death is a lie I wanna hear voices of angels above Singing as one
Chorus: Hallelujah holy holy God Almighty great I Am Who is worthy none beside Thee God Almighty great I Am
Verse 2: I wanna be near near to Your heart Loving the world hating the dark I wanna see dry bones living again Singing as one
Bridge: The mountains shake before You There demons run and flee At the mention of Your name King of majesty There is no pow'r in hell or any who can stand Before the power and the Presence of the great I Am The great I Am (5X)
